name: Sex Simulator: Hot Sauna
description: An interactive sex simulation game, featuring realistic high definition graphics and characters. You play the role a guy having fun at a SPA/Sauna with 3 gorgeous women.

name: Feet in the Snow
description: You keep having this strange dream, why don't you talk about it? Maybe you can make sense of what it all means...

name: To Take Root Among the Stars
description:
To take root Among the Stars is a short narrative platformer.

Play as Mei Hashimoto, one of the colonists send to an exoplanet to prepare it for the arrival of the rest of humanity.

Explore the colony and its surrounding flora and fauna. Talk to your fellow colonists and send a message to earth via the relay station at the top of the nearby mountain.

name: Castlevania Chronicles II: Simon's Quest
description:
A fanmade remake of Castlevania 2: Simon's Quest is offering a whole new way to play the most infamous entry in Konami's classic vampire-hunting series.

Back in 1995, Konami released Castlevania Chronicles on PS1, which remade and remixed the original Castlevania for then-modern standards. Now, in 2023, the fan studio WarMachine has released Castlevania Chronicles 2: Simon's Quest, which takes the same approach for the divisive NES sequel.

This remake takes the bones of Simon's Quest to craft a whole new game. You still explore an open-ended overworld, get hints from NPCs, and explore dungeon-style mansions to acquire key items. But the world has been remixed, the mansions have been completely revamped, and the old currency system has been completely revamped.

name: The Zebra Z
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Eat grass with the main hero of the game The Zebra Z and eat all the grass in the world!

name: Kindergarten: Buddy Edition
description: Uncover a grand conspiracy by living the same day over and over again. With the power of friendship, excessive violence, and nuggets, you will discover the truth.

name: Chex
description: Chex is a strategic board game currently based on Gliński's hexagonal variant of chess. Players must use their pieces to capture their opponent's king. The hexagonal board introduces new challenges and opportunities.

name: Torch
description: Jump, transform and triumph over your opponents in an insane climb in Torch the elements platform game !

name: Caves of Lore
description: Engage in tactical grid-based combat in this classic-styled fantasy CRPG.

name: Qdice
description: A turn-based multiplayer strategy boardgame

name: Magic Klondike
description: Crazy days? It’s time to relax. Spend hours and hours on solving classic card game. This is a truly timeless classic with a beautiful graphic style!

name: Kardomance
description:
A competitive card game set in the fantasy world of Ama Luria.
Developed and published by Armored Frog Games.

name: Quiz Thiz France: Silver Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Demolish & Build Classic
description: Buy machines and discover new possibilities by modifying their equipment. Use specialized hand tools for finishing work.

name: Poly Puzzle: Butterflies
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with butterflies.

name: Palette Swap
description: A monochrome action platformer where the palette changes the environment around you

name: Demon Queen Melissa
description: After living alongside humans for so long, the new demon queen, Melissa, tries to rule the land in a more peaceful way. Despite this, a holy curse is cast upon her while a hero is visiting. Now Melissa has to regain her full power.

name: Beer Pong Basement
description: Experience the classic party game of beer pong in virtual reality! Challenge a friend or practice your skills against a training robot. Play regular beer pong or add some excitement and change things up with an arrangement of items and power-ups. Watch the entire Youtube library, either by yourself or together with friends. Beer Pong Basement has more to offer than beer pong though. Try your luck at the slot machine or the Flappy Cuppy arcade machine to earn credits. Or try to unlock the many different ping pong balls this game has to offer. Bring the party to your headset with Beer Pong Basement!

name: Ninkyo Dantai
description: Ninkyo Dantai is a 3D top-down, role-playing video game developed by TeamCS1. It is the first mainline title in the Ninkyo Dantai franchise developed as a turn-based RPG.

name: Star Ring
description: Novel × Otome × Simulation Development Welcome to Star Poetry Academy! You who pursue your dreams will be the brightest star in the future. ——Nine career routes, seven playable characters, and rich game systems create a unique showbiz legend

name: Nope Nope Nope Nurses
description: The world’s worst nurses are back, and they’re nastier than ever! Can Yamada escape the clutches of the “OG Three,” a triple threat of veteran nurses who like to play dirty? Find out in this, the second genre-defining hospital misadventure visual novel from Dark One!

name: Shadow Hunter
description:
You must catch all the ghosts of each screen, only in this way you can activate the trap that you must collect and activate it to finally enclose them and move on to the next screen.

You will find levers that give you access to restricted areas, as well as areas with blades or lava that will make your life a little more difficult.

Time is limited on each screen so you don't fall asleep.

Once you have caught all the ghosts of the 4 floors of the building you will have completed your mission, good luck!

name: Fire Emblem Engage Bundle
description: The Fire Emblem Engage Bundle includes both the base game and its expansion pass.

name: Pokémon: Close Combat
description: A Fast Paced, 2D Pokémon Fighting Fangame, where you duke it out in local or online matches as your favorite fighting type Pokémon from across the series!

name: Corpse
description:
Explore and manage your resources in a short yet bizarre game

Wander through the streets of the town and search CORPSE fragments to lift the curse.

Check your inventory and you may find key information on how to escape this nightmare.

name: The Stockpile
description: Preparing to move in with your new roommate, you have just a few last things before you can clear out the storage place you rented. While grabbing the last boxes, strange noises leave you wondering: is someone else with you?

name: Monster Fishing
description: Go on a trip to find monster fish all over the world! A fishing RPG that saves lives while you fish!

name: 911: Cannibal
description: Search items and solve puzzles to escape from the cannibal's plate. Cover up your tracks so that the maniac does not suspect anything.

name: Baldo: The Elemental Temples
description: Baldo's free update, The Elemental Temples includes enemies you'll encounter and more, featuring four new dungeons and more. The update is a new standalone adventure for lovers of complex dungeons, and the story follows the events after the Three Fairies DLC and before the Guardian Owls.

name: EXS2: EthnologySister2 - Structuralism of Kinship System
description: EXS2 is a role playing visual novel.

name: Furry OwO
description: Furry OwO is an incredibly addictive puzzle game in which your favorite big furry boys are waiting for you.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage Expansion Pass
description: Obtain Emblem Bracelets to Engage with more Emblem characters and get support items and new accessories with the Paid DLC for the Fire Emblem Engage game. Purchase and download the Fire Emblem Engage: Expansion Pass today for Wave 1 and meet Edelgard, Dimitri, and Claude (as a one Emblem Bracelet) and take on Divine Paralogues to get Tiki as an Emblem character. As more waves become available, you can test your mettle in even more Divine Paralogues, obtain Emblem characters and accessories, and experience a brand-new story with added characters and locations.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 1
description: Fire Emblem: Engage Expansion Pass - Wave 1 includes character – Edelgard, Dimitri, Claude and Tiki. Also includes in-game support items, In-game accessories and Silver card.

name: Her Feet
description: The male protagonist is a white-collar, he has a little secret hobby, like massaging girls' feet. But it's not an easy thing to get strange girls to accept it. The player needs to help him meet the girl and gain her trust, get her to agree and enjoy the guy massaging her feet.

name: Webcam Sex
description: Webcam Sex - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Aquarium Match3 Mania
description: Sin descripción

name: RPG Architect
description:
“RPG Architect has been in development for almost two years, but can already produce a number of simple, playable games. We have been on the Patreon platform for almost half a year (and in private testing for a year and a half) with a number of people asking for a true "release" on a larger platform. Steam Early Access offers us a better way of distributing RPG Architect to a larger group of people.

RPG Architect's goal is to make a game development environment, inspired by the community. As such, we want the wider community to help shape how RPG Architect gets to its full Release version, as well as beyond!”

name: Flipy
description: Flipy is chilling game with Christmas atmosphere. Your goal is to stack as many blocks on top of each other as you can to achieve the highest possible score. Good Luck!

name: Demonic Tales Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:
- Demon Hunter: New Chapter
- 9 Clues: The Secret of Serpent Creek
- The Secret Order: Return to the Buried Kingdom

name: Talisman: Digital Edition - Deluxe Edition
description: The officially licensed multiplayer version of the classic fantasy adventure board game, Talisman. On your travels, you will need strength, courage and some good dice rolls to survive the dangers you face and beat your opponents to the centre of the board!

name: That's a Cow: Eggshell
description: Fly through levels with your new eggshell.

name: Party Party Time: Party Harder Pack
description: The party's just getting started! Enjoy 10 new minigames! New downloadable content (Party Harder Pack) is coming to Party Party Time! 10 brand new head-to-head minigames! Get the gang together and keep the party going!

name: Mojito the Cat: Extended Edition
description: Roll into action in this quirky puzzle game. Travel the world alongside an adorable cat named Mojito or some of his new friends.

name: That's a Cow: Deluxe Edition
description: Soar through the air and don't get milked in this cute game. With this bundle you get a new headgear - an eggshell.

name: Party Party Time + Party Harder Pack
description:
10 brand new head-to-head mini games! Get the gang together and keep the party going!

The Party Harder Pack includes the following content:

10 New Minigames:
- Twirling Disks
- Robot Watch
- Go Go Race
- Conveyor Run
- Punch Fighter
- Boot the Bomb
- Air Hockey Rumble
- Block Slicer
- Escape Zone
- Labyrinth Escape

name: Arcade Machine: Clown Hunt
description: New Arcade Machine for 1 or 2 players! Hunt for the clowns is wild! Hop in for a rollercoaster of action!

name: Santa Claus Goblins Attack
description: Help Santa Claus save Christmas from the terrible Goblins.

name: Through the Years
description: Are you ready for a survival adventure of your lifetime?

name: Demon Hunter: New Chapter
description:
"Twenty years of peace came to an abrupt end, when Dawn Harlock, the last member of the mysterious order of demon hunters, has to, once again, face Archdemon Ragnar and save the world from evil.
One day she recieves a call from mysterious doctor Stuart Williams, who claims to be her foster father's long time friend. He promises valuable information about Dawn's biological parents, that might shed some light on her eerie past shrouded in mystery."

name: Crime Scene
description: You have to play for an ordinary guy who does a specific job. Your work is connected with crime, blood and death.

name: Lone Traveler
description: Lone Traveler - A story about a lone traveler, you have to dig, explore the location, fight monsters in order to survive on the island! Build a wooden ax or a stone pickaxe and go on an adventure!

name: SO-108
description: Work, eat and survive. In a dystopian future where corporations make the rules of society, SO-108 needs to earn money to survive, until a strange phenomenon happens and completely turns his life around.

name: Taste of War
description: Taste of War - is a hardcore 3D shooter with surviving elements where you play as the last survived soldier against different Kiborgs.

name: Finding Xavier
description: A short adventure in which you will have to use precise platforming in order to find your cat, Xavier.

name: TeamPunk
description: A steampunk twinstick shooter where you and your team need to work together to protect the Convoy.

name: Haunted Hotel: Personal Nightmare - Collector's Edition
description: After 20 years, you receive a letter about your missing mom and sister. Answers are waiting at the Freedom Hotel, but nothing there is quite as it seems. Can you overcome your deepest fears and save your family in time?

name: Super Mario Kart Featuring Retro HD & CDX
description: Well it looks like Retro and Mario are both back at it again and it appears that Retro will be having some new friends join him in an epic race for victory. It looks like both Mario and Retro really mean business now.

name: Tetris Cross
description: Tetris Cross is a puzzle game for Game boy.

name: Monsters Mess
description:
Trash horror game with underworld monsters that were unleashed when three friends broke the spell protecting their neighborhood.
The mess changed the reality of the world of the 3 young people who will now have the mission to defeat the creatures, to imprison them again.

Search every corner of the map in search of the crystals that are keys to other dimensions and face guardians possessed by the spell of the underworld who guard pieces of the relic capable of fixing the mess.

Reality is scrambled and things are out of place, just as memories intertwine, the unexplainable can come true.

name: Stroke the Horse
description: It is a dream of many to own a horse, or to bet on one, or for some to simply stroke one. Now you can, with your very own horse, well one on your TV anyway. Do what you want with it as long as it involves stroking. Enjoy your very own horse!

name: Hexagon Puzzle Blocks: Expansion Pack
description: This DLC adds more than 100+ puzzles to the base game.

name: Tet
description: Prepare a meal for the Vietnamese Lunar New Year dinner. But hurry, your guests are arriving soon! A short hand-drawn experience full of delicious surprises.

name: Tristia: Restore
description: Saw, hammer, and invent!

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Cute Cats 3
description: Cute and clumsy cats on guard of your good mood! ""1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 3"" are ready to help you gain positive emotions!

name: Beach Cafe: Caribbean Sand
description: Where is Grandpa? and why has his beach bar been closed for more than 2 years? An adventure full of puzzles and mystery begins! Explore, discover all the clues and read them correctly in order to advance. Let yourself be enveloped by a story of intrigue set on a beach.

name: Xposed Switched
description: Xposed Switched is a tribute to the golden era arcade games.

name: Devil's 5 Days: Mischief Game
description: A Role-Playing Game as play as an adventurer who travels with the pact demon, who is also his girlfriend, Ria, attend to a business contest with a powerful adventurer that lasts for five days to decide who will be the next pact holder.

name: Frido
description: Robot time traveler got into the past. To get out, he needs to get to the time machine, passing more than 10 exciting levels.

name: Meseugaki Yeong-ae-nim!
description: "Twenty questions party with Young-ae!"

name: Anno 1800: Dragon Garden Pack
description: Celebrate the New Year with the Dragon Garden Pack and create lucky dragon–themed districts with over 15 new ornaments.

name: Drift & Drive
description: Drift & Drive lets you take control of a massive collection of cool cars, a pickup truck, motorhome and towing caravan to show off all your driving skills in one place!

name: Stewart the Fox
description: Join Stewart the Fox on an epic adventure through four challenging levels filled with obstacles, enemies, and two boss battles. As you collect hidden items to help Stewart emerge victorious in this action-packed platformer game.

name: Shrine of the Spirits
description: The demon army is invading and the Goddess is in danger! At the most critical moment, you lead many heroes, equipped with artifacts, to fight for the Goddess in a dark fantasy world! Together with your friends, fight against the demon army and become a legend of the Pantheon!

name: The Jumping Chocolate
description: Join BIG C on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Pain
description: PAIN is a tough-as-nails, labyrinth-structured rage-game utilizing full-on space physics. Introducing things like Power-DOWNS, that can stack on top of eachother for the most painful experience. ...Can one make it to the end unscathed...?

name: Encoded War
description: Here is the 5-year contract to get your son back. You must become the morse messenger during World War II. Deliver our encoded messages and lead Deutschland to victory!

name: Coloring Pixels: Steampunk Pack
description: This Steampunk-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All things industrial but imagined in a fantastical way! Vehicles, gears and punkish outfits abound!

name: 80's Mania Pinball
description: Throwback to the golden age of arcade with this incredible pinball machine. Simple, funny and hard to dominate.

name: Ultra LMAD
description: A free roguelike deckbuilder about becoming an LMAD in a fantasy way. Get cards by taking classes, build a deck to battle against projects and complete all semesters to graduate.

name: Hike Valley
description: Head to a hike to the old mysterious valley and explore the hidden beauty of untouched nature. Explore many unique locations and buildings set to rot by humanity a long time ago.

name: The Cenozoic Era
description: The Cenozoic Era is a realistic animal survival game taking place during the rise of mammals, take control of a variety of animals and fight to survive among other players to reach the top of the food chain. Death, Destruction, Survival, Scavenge, Nature, Thrive, Conquer, Hunt. The Cenozoic Era

name: Counter Bottle Shooter: Pro Aim Master Target Bottle Shoot 3D Game Strike Pistol
description: Counter Bottle Shooter is a game where your objective is to shoot all the bottles while standing still.

name: Midnight Runner: Blade Galaxy Beat Puzzle Legacy 3D Games Ultimate Edition
description: Midnight Runner is a fast-paced 3D platformer where you'll use your parkour skills and your reactions to climb walls and move along them, overcoming difficult areas and traps.

name: Adventure Mosaics: Lost Expedition
description: Adventure Mosaics - Lost Expedition. Uncover hidden pictures! Choose your own adventure! 150 exciting levels for players of all ages!

name: I Won't Forget Hue
description: Disorganized and alone, a woman finds herself crafting new glasses in order to look at her own home with different shaded views. I won't forget Hue is a psychedelic thriller experience. You'll go searching for new lenses, try to figure out what is happening to her home and why she is all alone.

name: King's Hand
description: Classic 1v1 Chess, but you also have unique cards that will help you with dethroning your opponent's King. There is no checkmate nor stalemate, just a brawl between two royal families.

name: Image
description: Image is a first-person horror game. Explore haunted, ever-changing environments in an atmospheric, confused world and enjoy a truly terrifying gaming experience.

name: Phase Ninja
description: Play as the Phase Ninja and help him use his special abilities to defend nearby residential areas from an onslaught of enemies. Try to find the origin of this invading force and put a stop to it.

name: Tracadie Bird Shit
description: Play as a bird in a small city called Tracadie.

name: T-Rex Dinosaur Game
description: Next-Gen version of the cult game.

name: Xploquest 3
description: Xploquest 3 is a turn-based role-playing game where you explore an open world and manage your character.

name: Lincoln Green
description: Lincoln Green is an all ages Fighting game. A bright cast of characters battle to save Lincoln Green from the greedy Sheriff and his henchmen! Single player, online multiplayer, as well as couch multiplayer available.

name: Escape to the Ocean
description: Help Turtle and friends swim home to the ocean

name: Peachy Boy
description: Peachy Boy, This cute looking puzzle game is as hard as it looks cute. Can you beat the challenging 30 levels? Each level is specially designed. You have to collect the key and pass the level, but be careful!

name: King's Hand: Exotic Zeus Pack
description: An exclusive thunder/rainy reskin of the whole game.

name: King's Hand: Exotic Purgatory Pack
description: An exclusive hellish reskin of the whole game.

name: King's Hand: Seasonal Winter Pack
description: A snowy reskin of the whole game.

name: Robot Revolt
description: Shoot, steer and survive as an armored vehicle versus a rebellious swarm of robots in this reverse bullet hell. Choose from a diverse collection of items and weapons, each with their own upgrade path. Clear abandoned factories to earn traits and make unique builds.

name: Pocket Card Jockey: Ride On!
description: Saddle up for this unique solitaire and horse-racing hybrid from Game Freak, creators of the Pokémon franchise! Pocket Card Jockey originally released to great acclaim on the Nintendo 3DS, and while the basic rules are the same, the racing segments have been reborn in glorious 3-D!

name: Sudden Market
description: The supermarket has just closed, hurry up to find and collect all the products on your list without getting caught by the security guard! A fast paced stressful action game with 2 maps and 18 levels with increasing difficulty, made for speedrunning.

name: Canterz Paranormies 2
description: Canterz Paranormies 2 is a 2D Top Down survival horror game based on the story of the most renowned paranormal investigation team of the US, Canterz Paranormies, who received a request to investigate the Kentucky house located in the vicinity of the cemetery.

name: Attack on King: Reloaded
description: As the king, you have to fight for your kingdom with all your might. Move carefully, load your gun, aim at the enemy king and shoot without fail. With your smart strategies, you will fight your way through all levels and proudly take back what is rightfully yours with supreme glory.

name: Kitball 20000
description: Kitball is a homage to classic old-school Maze Shooters of the 90's era, featuring modernized gameplay and graphics, while still holding onto the original simplicity and charm of its inspiration.

name: Seven Spirits
description: The land needs a hero! Pick one among the most brave samurai (Earth, Wind, Water, Fire) and live the legend, fight the goons and find the Villain, the despicable Void Samurai that treatens the life of an entire empire.

name: One Tank Army
description: One Tank Army is a game in which your goal is to defeat everyone from inside of the tank, changing places at the same time. Use the main gun as well as additional machine guns to clear the battlefield from enemies.

name: Underworld Island
description: Underworld Island is a Full Motion Video (FMV) horror thriller interactive story game. Discover the truth about the Samsara on the Underworld Island. You must make the right choice every step of the way to save your daughterh. The game is developped and published by Mountain & Sea Studio.

name: Genzai: Serialization
description: Genzai:Serialization is a fantasy Japanese style Roguelike card game. You will play a role of one cute girl to explore the Sakura Mountain and use cards with yin-yang system to defeat different enemies. Many interesting creatures will also bring you a variety of possible plot journeys.

name: 99 Seconds
description: 99 Seconds, a fun, retro-style video game, where you can modify time to avoid all kinds of dangers.

name: Code Red
description: Play Code Red for Free! A fast paced online arcade third-person shooter. Unlock the mystery of the enigmas and use chaotic abilities to gain the competitive edge.

name: Project Malice
description: An isometric roguelike third-person shooter about a ruined Earth and the unending chaos engulfing it. Fight hordes of the infected, gather loot, make allies, traverse spacetime, and venture into the depths of what we could've prevented.

name: Fire Emblem Engage: Divine Edition
description:
Fire Emblem Engage: Divine Edition includes:
- The Fire Emblem Engage Game
- Steelbook
- Art Cards
- Poster
- Art Book
- Divine Edition Game Casing

name: Fire Emblem Engage
description:
Become the Divine Dragon and save the continent of Elyos!

Summon valiant heroes like Marth & Celica alongside a new cast of characters and engage in turn-based, tactical combat against a great evil in this new Fire Emblem story.

name: The Multi-Medium
description: The Multi-Medium is a visually unique 2D puzzle platform adventure in which you play an interdimensional explorer lost in the multiverse. Travel to diverse worlds, each drawn or painted by hand in a different medium and style, in search of your place in the cosmos.

name: Agent in Depth
description: Agent in Depth is a stylish pixel graphics indie action game featuring fast paced action and instant-death combat. Unfold the truth by running, jumping, and deflecting bullets.

name: Magic Kingdom War
description: Magic Kingdom War is a cartoon-style turn-based role-playing game. Each character has different skills and attributes. In the game, you can choose different formations to fight, and the formation can increase the character's attributes. Players need to collect more characters to grow their team.

name: Human or Not
description: Aliens are entering Earth disguised as humans. It's your job to expose these imposters. Can you tell who is human and who is not? Choose your own path while you keep the Earth safe.

name: Olgob the Bold
description: Traverse the Mutating castle to hunt down the Bear Lords and free the orcs. A Metroidvania Soulslike RPG where the world evolves as you progress through the story. As the world evolves so can you.

name: Harakiri! Geisha Girls
description: A new love simulation game MADE IN JAPAN! This slapstick love comedy is brimming with characters wreaking havoc in the glorious country of NIPPON! Get all lovey-dovey with one of the four girls (or all of them, you do you) and enjoy your new, improbable school life.

name: Hitman 3: Carpathian Mountains
description: The final mission in the World of Assassination trilogy takes you to the Carpathian Mountains. Death Awaits.

name: Hitman 3: Mendoza
description: As one of the most well-known wine regions in South America, Mendoza is the perfect place to take in the beautiful sights and acquired tastes of Argentina. From the sloping hills to the modern vineyards, there’s plenty of opportunity to explore.

name: Hitman 3: Chongqing
description: Under the flickering neon lights of busy cafes and amidst a flurry of small shops and food stands crammed into tight streets, Chongqing offers travellers a respite from the demands of everyday life. This megacity is a transportation hub with plenty of secrets off the beaten path.

name: Hitman 3: Berlin
description: Head to the outskirts of Berlin, a city known for its fairy tales, vibrant style and chaotic nightlife. Whether you’re looking for a place to reflect and recuperate or want to experience the dizzying adrenaline rush of an epic rave, Berlin will help you find them both.

name: Hitman 3: Dartmoor
description: Travel to the historic Thornbridge Manor in Dartmoor, England, for a mission with a murder mystery twist. Choose your own path to your objectives or take on the role of detective to solve a murder and eliminate your target. Two birds, one disguise.

name: Hitman 3: Dubai
description: Experience the grandeur and decadence of Dubai at the opening ceremony of the tallest building in the world. Join an excited crowd to witness the breathtaking scenery and explore the top floors of this exquisite building – both inside and out.

name: A Sad Journey
description: A wonderful third-person adventure game about a rabbit looking for his missing parents. In this journey you will search for Paws that will take you to special places where you will get your memories back.

name: Punch A Bunch
description: A challenging boxing game with an emphasis on player skill that takes time and practice to master. Fight your way to the top through 3 different championships each featuring unique opponents.

name: FreedroidRPG
description:
The game tells the story of a world destroyed by a conflict between robots and their human masters. Play as Tux in a quest to save the world from the murderous rebel bots who know no mercy. You get to choose which path you wish to follow, and freedom of choice is everywhere in the game.

FreedroidRPG features a real time combat system with melee and ranged weapons, fairly similar to the proprietary game Diablo. There is an innovative system of programs that can be run in order to take control of enemy robots, alter their behavior, or improve one's characteristics. You can use over 50 different kinds of items and fight countless enemies on your way to your destiny. An advanced dialog system provides story background and immersive role playing situations.

The game is complete, fully playable, and can provide about 10 hours of fun. It is still being actively developed, and help is welcome in many areas. People having - or trying to acquire - programming, map editing, or writing skills will find FreedroidRPG to be an exciting, fast-moving project in which they can fully express their creativity.

name: Snowman's Land
description: A map based on Snowman's Land from Super Mario 64.

name: Rogue-Like: Evolution
description: You are a new Mutant who has the ability to be immune to all other Mutant powers including the girl with the deadly touch Rogue. She's intrigued and susceptible to your influence so you can either play nice and show her the love she's been missing or train her to be your lap dog.​

name: Impostor but Huggy Wuggy
description: Help Noob, Pro, Chitter and others escape from the ship and try to survive Huggy Wuggy.

name: Wreckman
description: A clone of classic Pacman without Pacman assets. This is not a port, as existing game source code was not used/adapted for 3DO.

name: Biomech Hell
description: A run and gun that mixes old-school mechanics from games like Contra, Gunstar Heroes and Metal Slug; with more modern features and a large dose of violence. A total arcade experience for all lovers of retro gaming!

name: Let's Bully Nash
description: Let's Bully Nash is a short adventure game about an ex-magicalgirl trying to rescue her fish girlfriend despite the world's refusal to take her seriously. It has a single dungeon, where the boss has vore animations and a "bad end" visual novel segment.

name: Trivial Trivia
description: Trivial Trivia is a multiplayer trivia game, where you set the questions and the right and wrong answers. A fun party game to play with your friends, where you can test their knowledge about anything!

name: Pleonexia
description:
"Play as the fisherman of a quiet little sea-side town called Pleonexia. Relax as you fish and listen to the waves. As long as the townsfolk are fed, everyone will be happy and nothing will ever go wrong. Don't look under the surface." Brought to you by Portal Emulator.

A black-and-white 2D point-and-click horror game about the life of a fisherman.

name: Legend Of Ghost Slayer Idle
description:
Ghost Slayer, awaken your ghost power!
Awaken the power of ghosts to drive out the rebels and become a true lord!
Play Infinite Farming RPG, Ghost Slayer!

name: Idle Pixel Heroes
description: Idle Pixel Heroes is an idle game where you merge and upgrade stunning heroes to beat monsters. Collect and merge cute pets to increase your stats and become the best player in the rankings.

name: Super Burger Master
description: You will be overwhelmed by the crazy fast food kitchen work. You have to write down the customer's needs and make the perfect food to get the highest tip from the customer, but don't let the fast food restaurant go out of business.

name: Persona 3 Portable
description:
If I say there’s an hour “hidden” between one day and the next... would you believe me? Master the power of the heart, Persona, and uncover the tragic truth of the Dark Hour.

Experience the iconic, critically acclaimed RPG that reinvented the Persona series, Persona 3 Portable.

name: The Junuary Project
description:
A hack that tries to implement as many pre-release and prototype assets into SM64, With some extra polish.

Experience the stars of January ‘96, and explore long forgotten test stages. Race against Blargg, toss back at Ice Motos, and unlock the Yellow Switch.

Utilize old and forgotten moves such as Squat Kick, SSK Sideflip, Dashing and JumpStep3.

name: Q.U.B.E. 2: Ultimate Edition
description: Includes ALL downloadable content for Q.U.B.E. 2: Classic Gloves, Lost Orbit, Aftermath. In Q.U.B.E. 2 you play as Amelia Cross, an archaeologist who has awoken among the ruins of an alien landscape. With the distant help of another survivor you must manipulate the structure of this mysterious world and find a way back home. As you explore and solve puzzles to progress, thought-provoking questions about your true purpose and the origins of the structure you are navigating will need to be considered, forcing you to come to terms with a devastating truth that will shake your world.

name: Mischief Dungeon Life: Isekai Tensei shita Ore no Itazura Dungeon Life - Clara Edition
description: After an accident, Renji was reborn in another world as a "shapeshifter," a demon that can transform at will. He was reborn in a dungeon inhabited by demons… Using new demon powers, a thrilling and exciting life in the mischief dungeon begins…!

name: Stelloop
description:
Don't let the Moon get destroyed! A Horde Survival Roguelite in which you play as a witch, continuously orbiting the moon, while you as the player play out different cards to keep the moon alive and the enemies away!

Play different weapon cards, destroy cards to gain more stars, or fuse cards together to create even stronger cards! Do what you can to keep the enemies away for as long as you can, but don't be fooled, there is no winning in this rather laid back arena survival game.

name: Chronicles Of Albian: The Magic Convention
description: Gathering of wizards and sorcerers of the world is about to happen in Albian Castle. They have no idea what secret the castle holds!

name: Simple Mini Golf 3D
description: Simply mini golf fun with 72 holes and playable up to four players!

name: 2 in 1 Workout
description:
Body shaping is always good for our body.

These workouts are perfect for men and women, beginners and professionals. Do you want to gain muscles, lose weight, increase strength and stamina?

name: Car Parking Multiplayer
description: Realistic Driving Physics, Stunning Views, Car Tuning and Customization, and Millions of Fans Worldwide

name: Grip on Reality: The Jaguar
description: A pious blood-thirsty warrior with an insatiable need to sacrifice the blood of his enemies to his gods. He wields his blood-letting macuahuitl and calls upon blood magic to bleed his foes. Blood.

name: Arcade Archives: Tank Force
description: Tank Force is a 2D top down arcade game. It is a sequel to Battle City, with different graphic and various details, like bigger stages or new enemies. The player controls tank and must protect the base (with eagle). He must destroy all enemy tanks on screen. The tank cannot pass through water. All buildings are destroyable, but metal walls are invincible.

name: God Busters: Who watches the Watchers?
description: Episode 1: When fresh bodies start appearing from an explosion that happened weeks ago it's up to the "God Busters" to crack the mystery behind this case.

name: Enigma do Labirinto
description: Help the Abominable Cyclops of the snow solve the Enigma of the Labyrinth, so that he can be reunited with his beloved, who is waiting for him on the other side.

name: Martial Fire
description: Martial Fire is a classic 2D adventure game. Explore dungeons, ancient forests and deadly wastelands; fight enemies and solve riddles!

name: Sapiens League
description: Play for free and compare your skills with friends in this exciting competitive multiplayer game.

name: Ozymandias: Mesoamerica
description:
Great cities have stood in these jungles and highlands since time immemorial. Upstart tribes threaten the old balance. Will the peoples of the Jaguar enjoy one last pre-columbian golden age?

Including a new map: Mesoamerica!

name: Way of the Wizard
description: Way of the Wizard is a first-person adventure game. Take on the role of a traveler who wants to become a wizard.

name: The Sims 4: Bathroom Clutter Kit
description: Embrace the mess of daily life or create an organized oasis with The Sims 4 Bathroom Clutter Kit.

name: The Sims 4: Simtimates Collection Kit
description: Set the mood with fun and flirty loungewear from The Sims 4 Simtimates Collection Kit.

name: Tristia: Legacy
description: 20 years after its initial release on PC in July 2002, Kogado Studio’s simulation game makes its debut on Switch. While the graphics have been overhauled for the modern era, Eeji Komatsu’s cute and sexy illustrations live on. Experience the origin story and roots of the long-running Tristia series.

name: Doraemon Story of Seasons: Friends of the Great Kingdom - The Life of Insects
description:
Dig up a bug themed pack crawling with skittering outfits, furniture, and a mini-story.

Includes:
・5 outfits for Noby and Friends
・8 types of furniture
・Mini-story featuring Doraemon's Gadget: Lucky Mallet

name: Persona 3 Portable & Persona 4 Golden Bundle
description: From the Midnight Channel to the Dark Hour, two iconic Persona titles return!

name: Zumiman
description: A retro-style game made up of pixel art. Control the main character and hero Zumi Man to fight Suwill, a monster that pollutes water sources. The weapon is a water balloon that explodes like a bomb and creates a stream of water. Clear the stage while exterminating Suwill with water balloons.

name: Pixel Slayer
description: Idle RPG game with infinite fun and endless possibilities

name: Tactical Vengeance: Play the Game
description: Play 6 different Match with your friends or alone with Bots. Fight for your team to be the best team and win the Match! You can play Singleplayer and Multiplayer or PvP. Own Medals, Achievements and Playerlevel through the Matchs. You have to find food and water so you not are dying from needs.

name: SGS Taipings
description: The game recreates the Taïping Rebellion (1851-64), the deadliest Chinese civil war, costing the lives of millions. Play the Taïping rebels and their allies, fighting to create their own state, or be the Qing Emperor and crush the revolt and its foreign devils allies before it topples your dynasty.

name: Break Everything: Living room
description: The game is a fun shooter made on Unreal 5. You need to use a toy rifle to shoot balls to break all the objects in the room.

name: A Matter of Principle
description: A Matter of Principle is an interactive historical comic in visual novel format. You have to participate in one of the most high-profile events of the XX century.

name: Pepper Girl
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Mischief Dungeon Life: Isekai Tensei shita Ore no Itazura Dungeon Life - Dorothy Edition
description: After an accident, Renji was reborn in another world as a "shapeshifter," a demon that can transform at will. He was reborn in a dungeon inhabited by demons… Using new demon powers, a thrilling and exciting life in the mischief dungeon begins…!

name: Rubber Bandits: Go Wild Pack
description: Release your inner beast!

name: Rapscallions on Deck
description: Four unhinged pirates kidnap Larsa since they’re in desperate need of a swabbie to mop the deck. And that’s how Larsa finds herself on a pirate ship in the middle of the ocean. Since women are prohibited on board, she doesn't know how she’s going to tell the crew that she’s a girl.

name: Steel Division 2: Blood Feud in Transylvania
description: Steel Division 2: Blood Feud in Transylvania focuses on allies turned enemies. Command six new divisions as Axis Hungary, German, or Allied Romania. Relive the Battle of Turda with a new Army General campaign, and lead dozens of new units to victory on the blood-soaked battlefields of Transylvania.

name: Fortune the Fated
description: To unlock ancient spells needed to defend the galaxy, can you navigate fantasy quests, noir cases, heroic competitions, dystopian worlds & space heists?

name: Boing
description: Boing is a fast paced action game where you play as the Boing and defend against waves of more and more challenging enemies.

name: The Survival of Sarah Rose
description: The Survival of Sarah Rose is an epic-fantasy erotic visual novel, following the life of the eldest daughter of the royal Rose family. When tragedy strikes, Sarah finds her once safe and stable life thrown into chaos.

name: A Bit of Tactics
description: In the farms of Abitof monsters are grown for their yield of rare items. But a successful harvest is not easy, for these crops fight back. As with all creatures their hearts yearn for tactics. Use this as your advantage, progress through the dungeon defeat their boss and reap the rewards.

name: Colossal Cave
description:
Roberta and Ken Williams who founded and ran Sierra On-Line for nearly 20 years have come back from a long retirement to pay homage to the game that that started it all: The Colossal Cave.

Developed using Unity, over a two-year period, Colossal Cave is a first-person, single-player, 3D adventure that will delight the millions of Sierra and Colossal Cave fans worldwide.

name: Tortuga: A Pirate's Tale
description: It’s time to see if ye truly have what it takes to become the greatest pirate of the Caribbean! Set sail on the vast and beautiful Caribbean Sea as players commence their journey with their sights on eternal gold and glory. Choose from 18 unique ship types and customize distinct features from the flag and weaponry to the hull and figurehead. It's a vast world out there, but you are never truly alone, and players will encounter historical pirate captains who they must decide is friend or foe. Take on trading convoys and settlements in tactical turn-based battles to relieve them of the burden of wealth, and then use your (stolen) riches to upgrade your formidable fleet. With a mighty fleet and enough gold, you might be able to keep your crew happy. But be warned! You are an elected captain, after all, and it is your duty to maintain your crew's morale, or else mutiny could be on the horizon…

name: Blinded by Fear
description: Blinded by Fear is a survival horror experience with a twist. You can't see anything! Navigate a 3D world with a novel lidar based sight mechanic. Solve puzzles, uncover a twisted mystery and confront unseeable horrors dwelling in the darkness. Can you survive when you are Blinded by Fear?

name: The Director's Disorder: Pilot Episode
description: The Director, a psycho killer, has chosen you to play the main character in his next film. Will you play your part and survive the night or will you be his latest victim?

name: Pentacore
description: Pentacore is a metroidvania with a focus on platforming and exploration. Run, shoot, climb, and blast your way through a massive world. All in order to find five keys and leave your prison of a planet.

name: Estencel
description: Slash your way through Estencel! Traverse across a corrupted, maze like city fighting horrors. Customize and arm yourself into the ultimate monster killing assassin in this fast paced horror/fantasy Action RPG. Solve the mysteries of this world before they swallow you whole.

name: Rain World: Downpour
description:
Rain World: Downpour is a DLC expansion of Rain World. Take control of five new characters with new abilities in this vast, redefined world. Slugcats have adapted to the harsh conditions alongside evolved predators! Survive new environmental conditions, dangers and explore uncharted territory.

Return to the unwavering wild in Downpour, where you explore new, harsh lands and survive new predators. As time passed, the slugcat has evolved. With five variants of the species - take advantage of various skills that they possess and explore their own personal tales.

name: Golfie
description: Golfie is a run-based, roguelike minigolf deck builder. Play through procedurally-generated levels, build a deck of crazy card abilities, and try to beat all 18 holes. Pick your route carefully because no two runs – or shots – are the same!

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Soul Arena
description: Soul Arena is a round-based multiplayer strategy game that takes place in Games Workshop's amazing Age of Sigmar universe. Players choose from a diverse and powerful range of captains available and then take turns facing off against each other on the battlefield.

name: Fraymakers
description: Fraymakers is a full-featured modular platform fighter from McLeodGaming, the creators of Super Smash Flash 2, the most popular Smash Bros. fangame on PC. It features a main cast of beautifully sprited and hand-animated characters, detailed stages from their worlds, and a massive selection of assists from a broad selection of indie titles!

name: AColony
description: A 3D base building and colony management game. Build your colony, construct houses in various ways, research technologies, generate electricity, craft advanced weapons, handle your colonists and defend your property. You can face the world and its events alone or in co-op with other players.

name: Your Story
description: Your Story is a visual novel based in a fantasy world where you're a guide for a half-elf named Lia. She has no friends and can't find her place in this world. Together you will encounter meaningful choices, romances, mystery, and more. Will her story become Your Story?

name: A Space for the Unbound
description: A coming-of-age adventure where you follow two high school sweethearts on a journey of self-discovery at the end of their high school years while facing the end of the world. Explore 90s Indonesian town, uncover its secrets, use supernatural powers to dive into people's hearts, and pet cats.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
description: A mobile game based on the TV series Who Wants to Be a Millionaire developed for iOS devices.

developers.name: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited

name: Soul Sipper
description: Suck the souls of unsuspecting victims to survive in Soul Sipper, a twisted platformer game by Mors, Gaem, and Catonator. Use your straw to propel yourself through 9 levels filled with many different obstacles!

name: Menage a Trois
description:
Sol Fitzroy is a gloomy student starting college at her parent’s behest. She expects nothing from the prestigious Ivy University, but with soccer sweetheart Chet Chester and football star Bill Lowman, Sol might have a good time in the end.

As Chet encounters hostile teammates and Bill deals with his father’s expectations, Sol makes a realization of her own. Menage a Trois is a LGBTQ+ visual novel about a trans girl, a (soccer) ball boy, and an all-American football star.

name: Haikuna
description: Haikuna is a word search game set inside The Wonderful Wizard of Oz, Journey to the Center of the Earth, and Don Quixote. Players teleport around these stories to find the words to haiku written in the Nanboku-chō, Edo, Genroku, & Meji eras of Japan.

name: Terrianis
description: Terrianis its a short set of boom maps inspired a bit by Crumpets. These maps follow aesthetics of ruins, castles, temples and overall mystical landscapes. My main goal with these layouts was trying to archive interconectivity, as if the hold level its just one big place where everything its joined together.

name: Google Dinosaur Shooter
description: The Chrome Dinosaur game but with a gun.

name: Genshin Impact: The Exquisite Night Chimes
description:
Version 3.4 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Alhaitham and Yaoyao
• New area: Desert of Hadramaveth
• New outfits for Lisa and Kamisato Ayaka
• New story quest for Alhaitham
• New main event: The Exquisite Night Chimes
• …and more!

name: FPS Seduce: Hentai
description: Make love to many beautiful anime girls in this First Person Shooter hentai masterpiece. The girls wants you and your... tool. To be able to reach the maximum orgasm. You will be alone with all these girls in an open world city. They will try to make you cum, it is your duty to make them cum first!

name: Stick Fight: Endless Battle
description: Stick Fight: Endless Battle is a game that combines puzzle, action, strategy, tactics.

name: Warspace
description: Warspace is a arcade space shooter game.

name: Monster Girl 2
description: This is a fascinating, casual, spot-the-difference puzzle game that tests your visual perceptual skills. Character accessories and the backgrounds are obscured. To complete the mission, you need to spot 8 to 15 differences to clear each level.

name: Beam
description: Sin descripción

name: Otok
description: This is a very chill Sandbox "City Builder", No Goals, just build your island as beautifully as you can with the given buildings.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Butterflies & Moths
description: Unveiling the Mysterious World of Moths and Butterflies!

name: Crawlspace 2
description: You saw an ad about someone needing help fixing their ventilation system. it sounded easy, but this job was much different then then usual work that you were used to.

name: Kong Hero
description: ‘Kong Hero' is a 2D platform jumping game with cartoon style. The player controls a cute little monkey through many difficulties and finally reaches the destination.

name: Agni Fighter
description: Agni Fighter is a vertical scroll flight shooting game with future technology pictures. In the game, the player will control a fighter to fight over the city.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Grimm's Tales 7
description: Magic or reality? Adventure or everyday life? The world of the Brothers Grimm fairy tales gives an unambiguous answer!

name: UnrealGundy
description: Welcome to UnrealGundy, a 3D platformer made by drevil1200. You play as "Gundy", a fictional character whose mission is to locate a gun, and fight any enemies along the way until you get to the boss. Be prepared for a fight at the end where only the most talented gamers will win!

name: The Palace of Unrest
description: Use poems to solve puzzles and escape the mansion with your life in this horror themed escape room game.

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - La Luz Mala
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two legendary weapons, and one Legendary tool: Luz Mala (Hunter), Del Ojo (Vetterli 71 Karabiner Deadeye), Raíz Mala (Caldwell Conversion Chain Pistol), and Premio del Tonto (Choke Bomb).

name: It Lurks!
description: Take on the role of a hardened Private Detective in this horror themed classic-styled Role Playing Game that pits you against fearsome foes in an exciting turn-based and interactive battle-system.

name: The Dungeon Rules
description: The Dungeon Rules is the most challenging game you can currently face. This game is a dungeon crawler with sokoban puzzles and cards combat.

name: Another World: Thought Taboo
description: "Another World - Thought Taboo" is a different world adventure game, you will explore this mysterious and dangerous world alone, and gradually discover the truth hidden in it.

name: Graze Counter GM
description: A refreshing and highly re-playable bullet hell style shooter that WANTS you to play dangerously! Ride the razor's edge of life and death in this high-risk high-reward danger oriented arcade style shooting game.

name: The Bad Kids
description: As an adaptation of the popular suspecse TV series, Cat's Cradle, this game combines investigation, solving puzzles and reasoning with original stories, which can build a more Immersive experience. Game will build new stories based on original setting and focus on the inner world of the character.

name: Joshua's Legs
description: Joshua's Legs is a strange game about an arachnid hoping to find his long lost prosthetic legs collection. Control the spider's legs individually using your joysticks. Venture in a world that will only reveal its secrets to the true hardened climbers.

name: Makis Adventure
description: Makis Adventure is an Action- Platformer with shark demons. Fight, dash, swim and bite your way through 3 different dungeons. Let the inner shark out! Face many different opponents and defeat powerful bosses.

name: Lake Haven: Chrysalis
description: Detective Zeke Reynold is called to investigate what he assumes will be another case he'll quickly forget, but what he finds will be sewn into the fabric of his existence forever.

name: Osiris: New Dawn
description: Osiris: New Dawn is an unforgiving near future space survival game with a cinematic feel and elements of horror. Play as a Mission Specialist in single or multiplayer to build your planetary base, pilotable vehicles, and controllable drones as you explore a dangerous solar system far from Earth.

name: Soups Christmas
description: Sin descripción

name: Tunic GBC
description: Explore the land filled with secrets, monsters and ancient ruins in this bite-sized demake.

name: We Are Only Moving Towards Each Other
description: A concrete poem in the browser, a love story, and a dream sequence traversed through closing and opening windows.

name: World's Hardest Hack
description: Sin descripción

name: WeAreDreaming
description: WeAreDreaming is a Chinese Yume NIkki fangame. You play as Zakurotsuki (附石榴), who refuses to leave her room. Exploring the dream world can also unlock wallpapers, music and menu skins.

name: MLB 9 Innings 23
description: Enjoy a Major League Baseball game in the palm of your hands! A Major League Baseball game officially licensed by MLB and MLB Players, Inc.

name: Tachyon Dreams III: The Rancid Buttermilk from Andromeda
description: Tachyon Dreams III: The Rancid Buttermilk from Andromeda is the grand finale to the sci-fi comedy Tachyon Dreams text-parser trilogy! In his third adventure, Dodger explores a barren world, travels back in time to relive past moments, and then journeys to a dark forest on the edge of the cosmos. It is time to finally discover the fabled worlds of the Margdonians, which the greedy Tgorodians have searched for all this time.

name: Universal Studios Theme Parks Adventure Adventure
description:
Christmas, 2001. You just unwrapped a brand new Nintendo Gamecube, the latest and greatest in video game hardware. All your friends will be so jealous.

Unfortunately, your parents did their holiday shopping late and Kohl's didn't have much left in terms of software selection. So you unwrap your one and only game, Universal Studios Theme Parks Adventure, and read the back cover:

It's a VIP ticket to theme park adventure!

Lights... Camera... Play! You've not just a visitor, you're the star in Kemco's Universal Studios Theme Park Adventure, a magical 3-D journey beyond the theme park rides and into an amazing realm of games based upon the most successful movies produced in Hollywood.

You'll love this virtual gaming lark through the world's best movie theme park!
It'll be months before your parents buy you another game. Let's hope this one is good.

name: Immeowtal Festival!
description: One day, Hachiko High School was bathed in heavenly light! The angels descended to judge, and the bodies of the dead dogs were piling up... but they were not all dead yet! Sora the Akita dog, vows to find his surviving furiends and strike back at the angels!

name: Everybody's Golf 2
description: Dust down your clubs - the game for every keen golfer has just returned to the top of the leaderboard.

name: Hartenjagen
description: A variation on the popular card game Hearts, literally translated from Dutch as "Chasing/Hunting Hearts".

name: Coffee Talk: Double Shot Edition
description:
Each copy of the Double Shot Bundle includes:

- A physical copy of each game
- Bundle-exclusive Coffee Mug
- Bundle-exclusive Embroidered Patch
- Acrylic Standee w/ 6 changeable café-goers
- Double-sided Tote Bag
- Mini Comics Collection
- Tea Towel
- 2 Wooden Charms
- Memopad featuring characters from the game
- Sticker Sheet (11 Stickers)
- Sticker Sheet (9 Stickers)
- A Soundtrack Download Card for each game
- Collector's Edition Box

name: Coffee Talk: Episode 2 - Hibiscus & Butterfly: Single Shot Edition
description:
Each copy of the Single Shot Edition includes:

- A physical copy of the game
- Wooden Charm
- Sticker Sheet (11 Stickers)
- Soundtrack Download Card

name: Coffee Talk: Single Shot Edition
description:
Coffee Talk is a coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator about listening to fantasy-inspired modern peoples’ problems, and helping them by serving up a warm drink or two.

Single Shot Edition includes:
- Physical Game
- Soundtrack download card
- Wooden charm
- Sticker Sheet

name: Golden Axe Returns
description: A Golden Axe Fan Game by ZVitor. The Story of this game takes place after Golden Axe III and before Golden Axe: Revenge of Death Adder.

name: Sword Art Online: Alicization Lycoris - Blooming of Forget-me-not
description: Blooming of Forget-me-not is the first major expansion DLC for Sword Art Online Alicization Lycoris. Additional content includes a new story, weapons, outfits, and more.

name: Hot Shots Golf 2
description:
Experience Hot Shots Golf 2 originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Combining addictive gameplay and stunning visuals, Hot Shots Golf 2 delivers a comprehensive golfing experience, with a wacky sense of humour.

name: Retail Wars
description: Retail Wars is a friendship-ruining 4 player couch competitive party game. Pickup and throw anything in the store to serve customers and knock out your friends in the fight to become the coveted employee of the month!

name: Syphon Filter 3
description:
A port of Syphon Filter, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Missions include stealth, assassination and all-out combat, plus a wide range of mini-games, including evasion, retrieval and demolition.

name: Star Wars: Demolition
description: Experience Star Wars: Demolition originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Epic Race: The Stadium
description: Let's challenge winding tracks in a stadium.

name: What is Snowman Made of?
description: An atmospheric mini game that let's you explore a snowcapped yard in which you build your very own snowman.

name: The King of Fighters XV: Character - Shingo Yabuki
description: Sin descripción

name: Mrs.Cat Between Worlds
description: Two otherworldly games featuring the incredible leaping Mrs.Cat

name: Umbrella Escape
description: Every problem has a solution!

name: The Simulacrum
description: A roguelike deckbuilder with procedurally generated cards

name: Pitch Silent
description: The Earth has withered away. Guided by an angel in the dark. You must brave the underground of Eden to find the all forms of creation to rekindle the light.
